title: How to Make a White Chocolate and Raspberry Cheesecake

steps.headline: Crush the biscuits with a rolling pin.
Mix the crushed biscuits together with the melted butter and 100 grams of the sugar.
Flatten the mixture to the bottom of a springform tin.
Allow to set in the refrigerator for at least ten minutes.
In a large bowl, combine the cream cheese and the lemon juice.
Melt the white chocolate in a double boiler and add to the cream cheese mixture.
Whip the cream with the remainder of the sugar and mix it with the cream cheese and white chocolate mixture and whisk until completely smooth.
Dissolve the gelatine in half a cup of boiling water and add to the mixture.
Pour half of the mixture onto the base.
Scatter with a few of the raspberries and pour on the rest of the mixture.
Cut the cheesecake into 6-8 individual slices.
Place two to three raspberries on each slice.
Drizzle with raspberry syrup and dust with icing sugar.

text: Making the Base Crush the biscuits with a rolling pin.  Mix the crushed biscuits together with the melted butter and 100 grams of the sugar.  Flatten the mixture to the bottom of a springform tin.  Allow to set in the refrigerator for at least ten minutes.  Making the Top In a large bowl, combine the cream cheese and the lemon juice.  Melt the white chocolate in a double boiler and add to the cream cheese mixture.  Whip the cream with the remainder of the sugar and mix it with the cream cheese and white chocolate mixture and whisk until completely smooth.  Dissolve the gelatine in half a cup of boiling water and add to the mixture.  Pour half of the mixture onto the base.  Scatter with a few of the raspberries and pour on the rest of the mixture.  Refrigerate overnight.  Serving and Decorating Cut the cheesecake into 6-8 individual slices.  Place two to three raspberries on each slice.  Drizzle with raspberry syrup and dust with icing sugar.
